post_title: WTB - Cincy and St Louis National rares
post_content:
Hello all,

I have a couple of sets I’m trying to complete.  Most any grades will work (1 or above, or a raw) I’m looking for the following:

Cincy drum any subject
Cincy Carolina Brights most any subject
St Louis National Carolina Brights any subject
St Louis national Broad Leaf 350 any subject
Billy Gilbert Old Mill any grade

Thanks!
Paul
